A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not only was the Last Jedi a really BAD movie. It was a really bad STAR WARS movie so not only has Rian Johnson cornered the cinematic market on idiocy\, he has disenfranchised millions of hard-core Star Wars fans and truly ticked them off. And no\, I don't subscribe to the notion that I am somehow too nostalgic or cemented to the \"old\" Star Wars\, I am merely a simply person who has immensely enjoyed the franchise since I was 12. It seems to me that Star Wars has been going downhill since the prequels. Perhaps it's time to move on ...
